name: BoundarySlider
summary: We can add boundary indicators to this slider, like ads, similar to those found in video sliders on many OTT platforms.
description: This slider has a lot of cool features like boundary indicator support, buffer indicator, and much more. This will help you quickly add a more customizable slider view, like those on major OTT platforms, without worrying too much about implementation details and allowing you to focus on business logic.
